messages.content: Perform a t-test between group A and B on metric M. What is the p-value?

from scipy import stats
group_a = df[df['group'] == 'A']['M']
group_b = df[df['group'] == 'B']['M']
t_stat, p_value = stats.ttest_ind(group_a, group_b)
submit(p_value)
